greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest positive difference between d and n/d for any divisor d of n.
comment: a(n) = A056737(n) for nonsquare n. a(p) = p-1 for prime p.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..10000
maple: a:= n-> min(seq((h-> `if`(h>0, h, NULL))(d-n/d), d=divisors(n))):
program: (PARI) for(n=2, 100, v=divisors(n); r=sqrt(n); t=0; for(k=1, length(v), if(v[k]>=r, t=k; break));  if(v[t]^2==n, u=t, u=t-1);  if(v[t]-v[u]<1, u=u-1; t=t+1); print1(v[t]-v[u]", "))
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Apr 04 2003
